mapper.select: SELECT A.itemId, A.iuser, A.itemQty, B.title, B.priceStandard, B.cover FROM t_cart AS A LEFT JOIN t_book_api AS B ON A.itemId = B.itemId WHERE iuser = ${iuser}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cart (itemID, iuser, itemQty) VALUES (${itemId},${iuser},${itemQty});
mapper.delete: delete FROM t_cart WHERE itemId = #{itemId} AND iuser = ${iuser}
